attributes.action: not encourage Birmingham city council to build a new stadium for Birmingham City as it is a complete waste of council tax funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Birmingham City F.C want the council to build them a new stadium as they can't afford to buy one themselves. The ground they have is sufficient, it holds over 30,000 and they don't sell out for every game.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
